msbt.message: Today is the Bug-Off! I couldn't sleep last night, I was so excited!
Ahhh! Why can't the Bug-Off start NOW?!
The Bug-Off starts at 9 AM!<10_4 /> I've already done all my warm-up meditation and exercises!
The Bug-Off has started! Time to get bug hunting!

I meditatedbut not enough! Can't let it get to me. I have to focus. Deep breaths!Innnn Ouuuuut Innnnnn I'm going tocatch me a bugor two Innnn Ouuuuut InnnnnnWhew! Any time you get freaked out, it's always good to stop and center yourself.<10_4 /> Now let's catch some bugs!
Hi, . Mind if I watch you catch bugs for a little bit?
Ohmigosh! That was so much fun! I got to see all kinds of bugs! What a, just, awesome day!
There was this bug that was SUPER cute. I let it run away, though.The world needs cute more than I needed to win the Bug-Off!
Hi there, ! The Bug-Off is harder than it looks!I'm going to maybe think about doing some training so I'll be ready for the next one!

I totally just made eye contact with this adorable bug!I could hear its thoughts I think.<10_4 /> It looked into my eyes and I heard"Hey, 'Sup?"<10_4 /> And I was all, "Nothing. You?" And it was like, "Nothing." Then it flew away!

I prepped for today's Bug-Off by watching videos online of a guy who was in his own Bug-OffBut he just kept doing this every time he got close to a bug<10_4 /> <10_10 />"Oh, gross! Bugs! AAAAAAAHHHH!"<10_9 /> Which wasn'tyou know a lot of help?
You know those bugs that hide under rocks? Do you think they're watching us, like, all of the time?I sure hope they are! It's GREAT celebrity practice! Hi, bugs! Thank you for being my fans!

I'd look all trendoso if I had big butterfly wings. I'd flutter out on-stage, all the lights on me, and say"Hey, world? You aren't EVEN ready for this much !" And they'd all say"No, . We're not ready for that much We want MORE!", I am going to be SUCH a good celebrity!
's Bug-Off is getting suuuper popular!I mean, it's not more popular than me or anything. But still, it's a pretty big deal, .

! I've GOT to tell you about this new technique I'm using to catch bugs! So what I do iswhen I'm sneaking up on a bug, I start sending it messages with my mind. I say, "Doooon't move, little bug. Hold niiiiice and still, little bug." And it totally works sometimes! I mean, sometimes it doesn't work. But I'm probably just doing it wrong or something, .
I don't want to brag or anything, but I have this feeling I'm going to catch THE coolest bugs during the Bug-Off. OK, maybe I did want to brag. But only a teensy bit, .
<10_10 />Helloooo! Buuuugs! Come heeeere!<10_9 />Ugh, it feels like I've been calling to them forevs. And NO LUCK!Demanding attention usually works for me. What gives, ?

I want to try hard at this Bug-Off thing. But, like, I don't want to try TOO hard, if you know what I mean. What I mean is, I don't want to try so hard that I look like a try-hard, 'K?Oh, fine. I don't really even know what that means. I should probably just try to have fun, .

Get this! I was practicing swinging my net to prepare for todaywhen I realized it's ALL about the beat! Swoop one! Swish two! Scoop three! See? It's just like when I'm dancing onstage in front of my fans! Only thing is, the beat kept scaring away all the bugs. I hope it doesn't scare away my fans too!
I am almost as excited about this summertime Bug-Off as I am about getting up onstage to sing! Just you watch, I am going to steal the show! Sorry, not sorry!
I am itching to catch a bug today! Or, likehave I been bitten by a bug, and that's why I'm itching?

I want to try hard at this Bug-Off thing. But, like, I don't want to try TOO hard, if you know what I mean. What I mean is, I don't want to try so hard that I look like a try-hard, 'K?Oh, fine. I don't really even know what that means. I should probably just try to have fun, .

Get this! I was practicing swinging my net to prepare for todaywhen I realized it's ALL about the beat! Swoop one! Swish two! Scoop three! See? It's just like when I'm dancing onstage in front of my fans! Only thing is, the beat kept scaring away all the bugs. I hope it doesn't scare away my fans too!
I am almost as excited about this summertime Bug-Off as I am about getting up onstage to sing! Just you watch, I am going to steal the show! Sorry, not sorry!
I am itching to catch a bug today! Or, likehave I been bitten by a bug, and that's why I'm itching?
